welcome_message_body: Welcome to Plumstead, UK! Get ready to experience the charm and warmth of this quaint city known for its beautiful architecture and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Plumstead has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet services, offering a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to Europe and other destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to North America, Asia, and other destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to Africa, the Middle East, and other destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to Asia, Australia, and other destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international and domestic flights for British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for 45 minutes, with options to purchase additional time.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is a modern and spacious terminal serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busiest terminal, serving a wide range of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Southend Airport handles a variety of freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
